page.title: 05Community Health Services
page.content: Many of those in the Centre go out to the area to give a number of Community Services.Doctors visit people at home. Health Visitors and District Nurses go to the homes for a number of reasons, eg a person just out of hospital,house -bound and old people.The chiropodists visit the elderly at home.Social Work- ers call to see those with whom they are concerned.Dentists visit schools in the area,and the Dental Hygienists advise the children on the care of the teeth.Doctors and Nurses visit several schools including Knockburn and Sight- hill.New entrants to schools are given a medical inspection and these are con -tinued regularly.Vision,colour vision and hearing are tested,routine hygiene inspections made.Pupils get a"jag"for tetanus and diphtheria,"sugar lump"for polio,and immunisation against measles and whooping cough if parents desire.
